name: Curren Chan (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Curren Chan (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.6~1.0

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • curren chan \(umamusume\)

      • (optional)smile, hands on own chin,

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • vertical-striped dress, bare shoulders, off shoulder, closed mouth, long sleeves, collared dress, gloves

    • Wedding costume :

      • elbow gloves, black wedding dress, black gloves, string of fate, official alternate costume, closed mouth, bare shoulders, sleeveless dress

    • Casual clothes :

      • jewelry, white shirt, white long sleeves, necklace, red skirt, sleeves past wrists, black pantyhose

        • maybe white shirt need more weight

  • Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 133 images of curren chan

    • 4x low quality 42 images

    • 8x medium quality 48 images

    • 16x high quality 43 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1240 images

  • replaced character feature tags with curren chan \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, pink hair, purple eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 9 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
